actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide more adequate coverage of the services of clinical psychologists under the medicare supplemental benefits program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for certain clinical psychologists' services under the supplemental medical insurance program. Increases the level of payment for outpatient mental health services to $1,000 annually.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide more adequate coverage of the services of clinical psychologists under the medicare supplemental benefits program.
